name: MR SuRV1VeR
description:
This game was made in a few weeks tried my best even though faced many issues with the scripts and other issues but this is the final result. please give feedback on how to improve it. All done by me.  :)

The first weapon (Glock-18) is to increase the difficulty.

The second weapon (Desert Eagle) is to actually kill the enemies.

(Keys)

Movement keys:

  W

ASD

Jump key :

Space Bar

Open Menu :

Enter 

- Good Luck
